name: CVR Partners, LP
description: CVR Partners, LP is a leading manufacturer and provider of nitrogen fertilizers in the United States. Established in 2011 and based in Sugar Land, Texas, the company primarily focuses on producing urea ammonium nitrate (UAN) and ammonia products that are essential for agricultural applications. These products are crucial for enhancing crop yields and improving food production efficiency. CVR Partners operates a state-of-the-art nitrogen fertilizer production facility in Coffeyville, Kansas, which utilizes advanced technologies to minimize environmental impact while maximizing production capabilities. The company plays a vital role in the agricultural supply chain, supporting farmers with high-quality fertilizers necessary for crop growth. With a commitment to sustainability, CVR Partners strives to implement environmentally responsible practices throughout its operations, ensuring that it meets the growing demand for food while protecting natural resources. Through strategic partnerships and a focus on innovation, CVR Partners aims to strengthen its position in the fertilizer market, responding to the evolving needs of the agricultural sector. The company’s vision encompasses not just profitability but also a dedication to sustainable agriculture, contributing to the global challenge of food security.
